title: Onion and Parmesan cheese on toast
ingredients: ['1 large loaf brown bread, sliced', '1 large onion, quartered', 'parsley, to taste', '2 teaspoons butter', 'salt, to taste', '2 teaspoons oregano', '1 1/2 tablespoons white sauce', '3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese or mayonnaise', '4 tablespoons grated mozzarella cheese']
